title: TR-8R Garen

replies.body: Is the trooper literally called TR-8R, or is this a fan-thing, cause you can read it traitor?

> [{quoted}](name=Skelenth,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=peAA9HEA,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-01-08T17:39:37.319+0000)
>
> Is the trooper literally called TR-8R, or is this a fan-thing, cause you can read it traitor?

TR-8R is a fan given name, his real name is FN-2199.
I have a theory his name is really TR-8R and he had no idea who Fin was, he just decided that he should announce his name before the duel.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Whist,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=peAA9HEA,comment-id=000300000001,timestamp=2016-01-08T19:11:14.229+0000)
>
> I have a theory his name is really TR-8R and he had no idea who Fin was, he just decided that he should announce his name before the duel.

"His name is FN-2199,""But his friends call him 'Nines.'”
Trained by Captain Phasma in the FN-Corps and part of battalion Z6
"Let’s hope we haven’t seen the last of Nines."
starwars.com

> [{quoted}](name=HellhamerX,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=peAA9HEA,comment-id=0003000000010000,timestamp=2016-01-08T23:42:22.458+0000)
>
> "His name is FN-2199,""But his friends call him 'Nines.'”
> Trained by Captain Phasma in the FN-Corps and part of battalion Z6
> "Let’s hope we haven’t seen the last of Nines."
> starwars.com

I sense you have missed the joke like a storm trooper misses wi a laser gun
They actually hit things in this one though.
Yeah they beat a bunch of villagers and drunken patrons but the second anyone with training shows up they start dropping like flies.
They were dropping, but they were also like hitting people with the shots overall, so while still not great it's a drastic improvement,

> [{quoted}](name=KillerMan2219,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=peAA9HEA,comment-id=000300000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-09T02:46:26.987+0000)
>
> They actually hit things in this one though.

There's actually a theory that they intentionally meant to miss things in the other movies in an attempt to direct their high value targets into a location that vader could finish them off himself.

That's pretty reasonable.  Sometimes it's more benefcial to miss. I know for a while over on ye olde competitive bf3 matches, it was better to miss the first shot because it would totally fuck the other dude's accuracy, assuring you a free win.
That's how you know this movie is a sham.
XD{{summoner:14}}
you forgot the FN, he was apart of the same squad as Finn

> [{quoted}](name=LordForrest,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=peAA9HEA,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2016-01-08T17:53:23.105+0000)
>
> you forgot the FN, he was apart of the same squad as Finn

Sorry, I forgot it via typo. Thank you for reminding me.
No problem
Too late it's done: https://youtu.be/tjHq4fgovOc
... and here i am, indecise between tampering the files to have a custom skin or not doing so for risking a ban :c

Seeing as I have Several Custom skins running (Winter Rift, Yoko Littner Cait, Asada Shino Ashe, etc) I think it's safe to assume that Riot doesn't really mind, as long as your custom skin does't change any gameplay files.
You can change files so long as it does not cause unfair gameplay, I think modding a skin in is fine.
From what I heard, custom skins are allowed by Riot, you shouldn't get ban for using them.
there is something known about skins that replicate already existing skins? how riot reacts to that?
I don't really know, I'm no expert about custom skins. You might need to look up in the internet.
I love that that is a thing, I can't get over those kooky shoulders though.
i feel like it would be better on garen tho

If Disney has any sheckle sense they'll get this guy back in another movie. I don't care if he got bowcastered. He's too LOYAL. Death would mean abandoning his duty. 

Finn doing something. 

Not even a camera pan. 

"Did you think I would forget about you. TRAITOR. " 

Fan Hype. 

I love that they tried to play up Capn Chromelady as this mysterious cool stormtrooper, and she gets into a trash chute off camera, and this guy steals the show as the first competent storm trooper.
Confirmed for Brawl?
Fun fact. he's also on the Loyalty Commission.
and his pappy executed Order 66.

His Pappy was on the board that co chaired the committee that helped draft the order for review.

And damned proud of it.
This.   So much this.

I think Jax would be a better choice, he already  has his whole body covered, his E spin would suit how TR-8R spun his baton, and his ult passive could let out a zap when he hits someone with the third strike.
I've seen the light and have been touched by the face of beauty herself. If I can't find this as a custom skin anywhere I'll be beside myself as to what I shall do.
